item.description:
Let's show the high level of grassroots activism at the Berlin Fair, Fri, Sat and Sun - Oct 5, 6 and 7th. Bring your signs if you already have them or make your own! If you have some extra lawn signs, please bring! Also if you want, print off some materials from the different RP sites and make some copies to hand out to passers-by.

Our meetup point will be at the Sam's Club/Home Depot lot on the Berlin Tpke. and we will transport to areas near the fair. The main point is to let the fairgoers see that we're out there and motivated about our candidate and his ideas and that they should be too.

Check Message Board for more details
See my latest entry for the schedule: Feel free to change, add or make corrections for your time slot.

Fair Hours:

Friday: 11AM - 10PM
Saturday: 9AM - 10PM
Sunday: 9AM - 7PM
item.name: Berlin Fair Sign Wave
